summary: Defines the core admin option classes that drive Django's automatic administrative interface, supplying default configurations, permission handling, form and inline form generation, and utilities for rendering and managing model data within the admin site.
business_intent: Provides a reusable, configurable framework that lets developers expose model management (create, read, update, delete) through a secure, customizable admin UI, reducing boilerplate and ensuring consistent permission enforcement and data validation across applications.
